description: The first level of Impel Down prison, known as Crimson Hell. A deadly forest filled with razor-sharp blade trees (Kenju) and needle-sharp grass (Haribarisō) that cut prisoners who are forced to run through it while being chased by poisonous spiders and Blue Gorilla guards. The forest is stained crimson from the blood of countless prisoners.
significance: The first torture level of Impel Down, housing the least dangerous criminals. It establishes the prison's brutal nature and the descent-into-hell theme inspired by Dante's Inferno and Buddhist concepts of punishment.

geographicalDetails.terrain: Deadly forest with blade-like trees and needle grass
notableFeatures: Blade Trees (Kenju) - Trees with leaves sharp as blades
Spike Needle Grass (Haribarisō) - Grass as spiky as needles

culturalSignificance: Based on the Buddhist concept of the 'Hell of the Sword Tree and Knife Hill' which similarly tortures victims by forcing them to run upon or impaling them upon trees and hills covered with knives and swords.

keyEvents.title: Luffy and Buggy Enter Crimson Hell
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Buggy crash into Level 1 and begin navigating through the dangerous forest of blade trees and needle grass.

keyEvents.title: Battle with Blue Gorilla Guards
keyEvents.description: Luffy defeats the Blue Gorilla guards stationed at Level 1 with a Gomu Gomu no Whip attack.

keyEvents.title: Discovery of Passage to Level 2
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Buggy discover the hole that leads down to the next level of Impel Down.
